item.title: My presentation at IstioCon 2022
item.description: I presented on Apri 28th (April 29th JST): “Accelerating ZOZOTOWN Modernization with Istio” at IstioCon 2022. It was an awesome experience for me to present for the global technology conference like IsitoCon. â›µï¸Istio is a synonym of acceleration & modernization. item.title: Visual Studio Code Textbook for programmer was published!
